text: Ani te mhanale, hi janavare ani seti harama ahe, yala toca kha'ila, jyala amhi apalya icchene khayala sangu ani kahi janavaranci patha (arthata svara hone) harama ahe ani kahi janavaranvara (jibaha karateveli) allahace nava gheta nahi, allahavara khote racanyakarita allaha tyanna tyancya aropaca mobadala lavakaraca de'ila
